errors.formatUnsupported: Only CSV exports are available at this time.
errors.missingClassId: Please provide a Class ID before running the export.
errors.noDatasetSelected: Select at least one dataset (board or reviews).

intro: Pull proposal content and review data directly from the MindHive platform. Choose the class, pick your data scope, and export downloadable CSV files formatted for analysis.
noResearchAccess: You need research-level permissions to access the export tools
selectAllBoards: Select 'All boards' if you want no filters
workflowStage: Select which stage to filter by
